caption: Relating to the purchase of or acquisition of title to real property by certain aliens or foreign entities; creating a criminal offense.
undersanding:
Summary (English):
This bill prohibits Chinese citizens, entities headquartered in China, or companies controlled by Chinese government from purchasing or acquiring real property in Texas. Violations result in forced divestiture and penalties - individuals face state jail felony charges, while companies must pay fines of $250,000 or 50% of property value, whichever is greater. US citizens and permanent residents are exempt, regardless of their country of origin.

中文总结：
该法案禁止中国公民、总部设在中国的实体或受中国政府控制的公司在德克萨斯州购买或获得房地产。违反者将被强制剥夺产权并受到处罚 - 个人将面临州监狱重罪指控，公司必须支付25万美元或物业价值50%的罚款（取较高值）。美国公民和永久居民不受此限制，无论其原籍国为何。
